author: Dennis Brophy

review: I'd been using my computer (an old, slow thing) to watch TV (I don't have cable) on Hulu, Netflix, YouTube, etc., and when the adapter that connected the computer to the TV broke, I started watching shows directly on my computer (small screen!).  Not to mention the other issues that arose when you have a piece of machinery that is simply Not up to par!  I'd seen the commercials for the Amazon Fire Stick and Knew That Is What I Needed!  YEA!  It was simple to set up (you will need your computer to get the start up process going) and it is easy to add more apps to the stick... very similar to what you do with your phone or tablet.  Even easier than adding new "channels" to a smart TV, of which I also have.  The Fire Stick remote is very easy to use as there are not tons of buttons you have to figure out and get used to.  I am beyond thrilled with my new toy and for the price it was a steal!  Enjoy!One thing I forgot to mention in my original review... The ScreenSaver that comes on the Fire Stick is AWESOME!  The pictures, of which there may be as many as 50 different ones, are OUTSTANDLY GORGEOUS & STUPENDOUS!!  It was worth the price just for the ScreenSaver pictures alone!  So, All in All, the whole package is a GR8 Deal!  Happy Watching~
